title: Appointment Scheduling

virtualAppointment.title: Virtual Appointment with Sports Doctor
virtualAppointment.description: Schedule a virtual appointment with your sports doctor to receive advice and follow-up on your training from the comfort of your home.

inPersonAppointment.title: In-Person Appointment with Sports Doctor
inPersonAppointment.description: Schedule an in-person appointment with your sports doctor to receive advice and follow-up on your training at an agreed location.

success: The appointment has been successfully scheduled
error: An error occurred while scheduling the appointment, please try again later
